get.summary: An offer that is published by a Facebook Page
get.description: An offer that is published by a Facebook Page

parameters.name: claim_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of times the offer can be claimed.

parameters.name: created_time
parameters.description: The time the offer was created.

parameters.name: expiration_time
parameters.description: The expiration time of the offer (for display purposes).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The page that published the offer.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: The URL for the offer's image.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The description text of the offer.

parameters.name: redemption_code
parameters.description: A code to to receive the discount or promotion.

parameters.name: redemption_link
parameters.description: The URL where the offer may be redeemed.
